name: Underwater (itch) (Xenius, Gerchis)
description:
(Xenia) Hi! I'm a 2D and 3D Artist. I have made the environment and character,  the animations and graphics 2D of the Underwater. 

 If you want to see my previous works, this is my website and my CV game : 

(Website)  https://xedurami.wixsite.com/misitio 

(CV game) https://dxenius.itch.io/the-best-resume-ever

And my twitter: 

https://twitter.com/DXenius


  (Roger) Hey! I'm a videogame programmer and I have made the gameplay, shaders and logic of the Underwater.

 If you want to see other projects that I have done in Itch.io :

(Horror game) https://no-mercy-studios.itch.io/hype-or-die

(Puzzle Plataform game) https://pr1n7v.itch.io/pr1n7

(Adventure game) https://pinxitostudio.itch.io/ryxiah

Credits  :

This game is make with Godot Engine,
and all the 2D art it's make with Photoshop.
The sounds are from Freesound and Audio Librery of Youtube. 

FeedBack:

But if you just want to try,
 feel free to leave your feedback down in the comments. 



    

 THANKS FOR ALL!
